meta.description: Implementation of the VISA standard (for instrument control)

license.fullName: GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

meta.long_description:
LibreVISA aims to be a compliant implementation of the VISA standard in a
free software library.

We currently support targets connected via USB, exposing the USBTMC
interface, and VXI-11 devices.
meta.name: librevisa
